subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
I am Elkin Knowles, and I work with the Records Department of Schlumberger Oil services in USA  and I am sending this proposal to solicit for a partner whom I will directly protect his contract interest in the new  Stumberger Oil services 2024 Joint Venture Contract (JVC) supplies and contract sponsorship
Schlumberger Oil services 2024 Joint Venture Contract (JVC) supplies and contract sponsorship which involves recruitment of new contractors for the supplies of oil equipment for Oil rig maintenance.
This contract program has a structured financial sponsorship /Contract take off FUNDS worth over Two billion dollars to enhance the financial capacity of all new contractors.
This means that the company will sponsor the every selected Contractor financially for the execution of the contract supplies and you can handle the contract supply from any part of the world. reply to my direct email:(
knowleselkin03@gmail.com
)
Please respond if youâ€™re interested with your full name and address and a mobile Whatsapp phone number where I can call you privately and discuss with you in detail.
Regards
Elkin Knowles
Schlumberger Oil services

subject: Re:   Good Day,
body:
Hello Elkin Knowles,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this interesting proposal. It sounds like a significant project with the Stumberger Oil services Joint Venture Contract JVC supplies and contract. I'm curious to know more about it.

Could you please provide more details about what exactly my role would be in this venture? And how does the company ensure the financial capacity of all new contractors?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Anna
